title: Review for Adults
text: The common idea is that TikTok is for kids. I am here to tell you that is 100% not true. There is a HUGE community of Adults on TikTok, and we are all able to have FUN and express ourselves in a way that can be silly, serious, goofy, or ANYWAY that you want. There is the "for you" page that allows you to browse through various broadcasters. To build the type of content you would like to continue seeing, you simply press the heart icon on the right hand side of the page. After a while TikTok will only show you the type of content that interests you based on your previous likes.  If you want to continue to see content from a particular person, simply press the plus sign on the right side of the page. This user will now show up on your "following" page ( located on the top left of your TikTok main page). This application can be VERY therapeutic for those of you that would like to create content. It allows you to express yourself in anyway that you want. I recommend this app 100% for boomers, Gen-X, Millennials, and ANYONE else who feels they might be too old for this app!!!

title: Tik tok
text: This app used to be one of my favorites, it was a great, entertaining source of funny videos and more, I loved it until I started getting harassed by other people due to comments I put that weren‚Äôt even that bad. I was a comic book content creator and on some on my videos I was called a ‚ÄúStupid kid‚Äù people having problems with me for no reasons at all. This caused me to delete the app, while I have some good memories of this app, I have flashbacks and memories about what those people said and now I cannot forget, it‚Äôs ruining me. For the people that this is happening to, delete the app immediately because once someone starts harassing you it‚Äôs almost impossible to forget well, for me anyway. I can‚Äôt even read a comic or look some of my favorite things in the world, DC and marvel, I can‚Äôt even look at a character without having some horrid memories of what they said. Long story short, I used to love the app but now. It tore me apart and took some of the best parts of me. I‚Äôve also had to push myself away from comics for a while. Due to this. And not to mention, I have been reading comics for 19 years and people said I‚Äôve never read one due to having a different opinion. Also even ridiculed for liking marvel and dc equally.

title: hiü§©
text:
This clock app is very fun and educational. the people on here have taught me so much and made me feel comfortable. I‚Äôve learned abt Earth science, animal science, ocean animal science, how to better hygiene, about really old history, about serial killers, about weird spooky stories, etc. 
Along with seeing a lot of accounts helping there followers. For example, A few people FaceTime followers (if both participants want to) and they have a meal together whether the reason is you don‚Äôt want to be alone or you feel weird eating without someone. also people spreading awareness about mental health and different psychological disorders. 
I‚Äôve also learned a lot about safety. How to protect myself from dangerous situations, learning about kidnappings, learning self defense, there are also many recordings people made so if you are being followed or in an uber it‚Äôs sounds like you are on faceTime with a friend and they know your location. 
There is so much creativity on this app and many community‚Äôs that feel safe together and like they have people to connect to. overall i‚Äôm very happy with the experiences this app had given me, Thank you.

title: love it.
text: I really like Tiktok. I'm addicted to it. I spend my day watching videos. But, i have sadly realized something. Most of the videos on the foryou page are celebrities, OR old videos with thousands of likes that still appear multiple times on my Foryou page. So i suggest that people who has like -100 followers should get more on the foryou page. They deserve the chance, even if they have -100 fans/followers, that doesn't mean they don't work hard on their Tiktok, they do. And maybe they are proud of them. I assure you when they film Tiktoks, they probably wish they can be like all of those influencers, go viral, be famous, but they don't get the chance to do it or at least get on the Foryou page. It's not always about Charli and the Hype House. It shouldn't be like that. One more thing, i think the number of likes on a video should get hidden but not for the creator, because when a Tiktok with like 80-90 likes get on the foryou page, the people who sees it will not like it EVEN if the content is original and they like it. Trust me, i assure you it is like that.

title: Obsessed!!!
text: I‚Äôve never been into social media, never was a fan of FB, Instagram is ok for certain things but again, never excited me, nor did Twitter, Snapchat or Pinterest, etc, but when TikTok came out, I was quickly swept away! I love that TikTok has a platform for everything. You want to know what the best vacuum to buy at a specific price point, TikTok will have a ton of creators that give you a quick rundown on which one they love and why along with a demo of course. Want to learn how to shuffle dance? There are thousands of tutorials to pick from. Want to connect with those on a spiritual journey or learn how to plan a destination wedding? You got it, TikTok will have it! What I love even more is that as TikTok begins to notice my watching preferences, it will select videos based on what I‚Äôve watched and put them in my feed and they do a great job of getting it right! Now if I could just get that guy to stop popping up to tell me I need to stop scrolling and get off TikTok for a bit.. üòÇ I‚Äôm told I‚Äôm too old for TikTok, I think my generation is going to take it over. üòò

title: Absolutely absurd
text: Tik tok is definitely a great app don‚Äôt get me wrong. Many people join the app daily and so many videos uploaded on the hour is insane. It brings joy to people that are sad, occupies the bored, and brings joy to the world. But tik tok has really slipped with its guidelines lately. The amount of abuse to get famous is so ridiculous. There is bad stuff such as nudity and unapproved showing of it as well from other people.  There is too much of showing off of their body to get 10k likes on a post. It‚Äôs so dumb to do this. Not to mention many young kids look at these videos too and they see older teenagers doing it; so they assume it‚Äôs the right thing to do so they start doing stuff. It‚Äôs influencing the younger kids to do bad things. Also, I am pretty sure that if some parents saw what kids were doing on this app, I garuntee that many parents would be upset with many of the videos posted. Once again tik tok is a great app to socialize and see people around the world and see what they are doing. But the guidelines have slipped away and now kids that are underage of 18 are allowed to post videos of them showing off their body and it bring allowed to be on the for you page. The app needs to shape up a bit before major targets start to notice some of the flaws with it.

title: Banned with no warning/reason
text: It seems this app definitely only likes accounts with a significant amount of followers. So many accounts with highly inappropriate content..remain online with an ungodly amount of views and comments simply because they have a high follower count. My teen daughter‚Äôs account was recently ‚Äúpermanently banned for multiple violations of community guidelines.‚Äù She only ever got one warning and video deleted (it wasn‚Äôt even an original video..it was a viral tik tok video she did..which constitutes about 97% of all tik tok videos). The original and recreated videos still exist and accounts are still open. No other warnings or anything else. She loved tik tok and spent time learning dances and recreating others videos, as is the point of the platform. But she didn‚Äôt have a high follower account. I searched and searched for who to email and ask for reason/proof behind the permanent ban. There is ZERO way to contact anyone. My daughter loved the creative platform but was shut out for zero reason. I personally monitored her posts. There was zero reason for the permanent ban other than her account not being popular. Way to to Tik Tok. As if teens don‚Äôt have enough reason to feel bullied and insignificant..you punish those who aren‚Äôt ‚Äúpopular‚Äù and delete the videos they spent time and effort to create and post. It‚Äôs disgusting.

title: Can you please add a folder feature to TikTok
text:
I love this app but I wish there was a way to put the videos that you favorite ‚ù§Ô∏è into folders on tiktok to find a specific video easier, because I love showing my dad funny tiktoks that I see but sometimes there are to many videos that I want to send and show him. It would be easier to be able to create a folder on TikTok ‚Äúvideos to show dad‚Äù or ‚Äú videos to show sister or mom‚Äù instead of sending like 10 links a day or not being able to find that funny video that you watched and liked ‚ù§Ô∏è  2 days ago and want to be able to show someone that video. And it would be nice to create a folder of ‚ù§Ô∏è liked videos that you want to come back to watch part 2 or part 52.

It would just be easier to be able to scroll through a folder of liked videos that you want to show someone on your phone or on your tv rather than having to scroll through all of your other liked videos just to be able to show someone a specific video and would be less annoying for that person rather than receiving 10+ video links a day.

title: Came here to make fun of app ended up staying
text: Originally I came here on this app in 2016 (I think?) or 2017, looking to make fun of this app. I didn‚Äôt realize how much I‚Äôd fall in love with this community though. Everyone has a spotlight on this app- dancers, memers, animators, even furries. Communities were made and it was so fun. I remember the furry war against the gamers, and the moment in time where we all made those area 51 memes. Or the anime community‚Äôs own akatsuki, or whatever it was called. Or when we all joined in to make a joke against bigger creators. (lil huddy is black, sebastianballz is orange, etc.) Honestly, the most fun events where when ALL of the tiktok community was involved. I wish those old creators would come back. I miss old tiktok sometimes, but new tiktok is kinda cool too. Everytime I come on this app I find something fun and new to laugh at. I Can‚Äôt believe I‚Äôm typing this and reviewing this, but I love tiktok. I only post comments but this app is so fun on so many levels. I encourage many people to download it and contribute to the thousands already joined today. The app needs more memes and original content- always.

title: Super fun but feels slightly prejudice..
text: I really love TikTok. You can be as creative as you want from reuploading your own videos to using the features within the app. There‚Äôs also many features to use within the app so it‚Äôs super cool. I do notice though, a lot of people of color create amazing content and their videos get taken down or discredited. Many other people use the things the original creator makes and their video will get more views and likes after copying the original and of course not tagging them. There‚Äôs this thing called being ‚Äúshadow banned‚Äù where basically a users content does not get the same outreach as others when posted. This has been a problem even with popular people of color creators! I don‚Äôt believe that it‚Äôs fair. Overall the app is still cool but they do make it harder to become verified or viral being someone with a darker complexion. You can believe what you want but these are facts. In no way would I say anything negatively out of spite but the problem needs to come to light and be addressed.

title: The Happy App
text: TikTok is my happy place, I just got it when all this COVID-19 mess started because my sister kept sending me videos and she knew all of the bad news was affecting me because I‚Äôm a news fanatic, I don‚Äôt post anything but I scroll through and I laugh and I think about learning one of the dance videos. TikTok has subject matter that interest anyone of any age, you can select the types of content that you want to see. I always thought it was for kids and never gave it any thought but whenever I‚Äôm feeling down, I can look at precious babies doing the cutest things or I can watch someone with a beautiful voice sing, or I can laugh at comedy skits and pranks, watch my now favorite chefs whom I never would have known existed and then the TikTokers who just motivate and share love during these hard times we are experiencing in 2020, it‚Äôs been an unforgettable year but TikTok has definitely made it a happy place for this old woman. I‚Äôm still stuck working from home but this app has given me something to smile about everyday! Thank You TikTok.

title: Just my opinion
text: I personally dont think tiktok is a great app. The only reason it says ‚Äúrecently downloaded‚Äù on my side is because my friend forgot his phone and needed to use mine. But while he was scrolling, i could see him just disassociate with the world and it was honestly quite heartbreaking. As someone who used to watch a form of tiktoks I can say that this app is EXTREMELY addicting, and ruins mental health. My friend had serious mental health issues while owning the app, but once he deleted it he said he never felt so free. Dont get me wrong the app has sort of tried to work on this problem with its ‚Äúone hour limit‚Äù meaning if you spend 1 hour on the app it makes it so you have to put in a passcode to continue using the app. And yes it was very smart of Tiktok on the children side of things, but on the adult and teenager side it doesnt look so great.  I was reading some of these reviews for fun and it was very upsetting.  Many people have complained that they have spent 13 or even more hours a day on this app.  People could be using this time to socialize, sleep, eat etc. but instead use it for rubbing a piece of plastic FOR HOURS.  I would really love it if TikTok would add a limit where it would just kick you out of the app after a certain amount of time.  Thank you for reading, -Pebble

title: Can‚Äôt get help from customer support
text: I am not able to like, follow, or be followed. I went through all the steps. Clear cache, check wifi. Report a problem if that doesn‚Äôt work. I reported and they responded with ‚Äúcheck WiFi and clear cache‚Äù (again). I write that I‚Äôve done all of that and it‚Äôs not the issue. It‚Äôs something broken in my account. I‚Äôve even logged on from different devices. They give me an email address to submit my issue to. They said I could make a screen recording and submit to the provided email. I spent a lot of time getting the screen recording short enough so that it would attach and send in an email. Soon after, I received an email saying that my message wasn‚Äôt sent because this inbox doesn‚Äôt accept emails. They provided a link to another form to fill out. It‚Äôs been 4 days with no response. I sent another message under ‚Äúreport a problem‚Äù and they sent me another link to fill out a form (same as the one I received in the email) no response. So infuriating. I just want someone to answer.

title: I Supposedly ‚ÄúViolated Community Guidelines‚Äù
text:
I felt that TikTok was a place to express and be myself, but clearly that is not the case.
I‚Äôm very disappointed in TikTok right now. When setting up a profile, don‚Äôt you have to put in your age, and then TikTok tracks it. My video was taken down for ‚Äònudity and sexual exploitation of a minor‚Äô, but one: I turned 18 a while ago, so there should be no reason why I‚Äôm called a minor. And two: my video had nothing that violated the guidelines. In fact, I had already read all of them, and kept them in mind while filming.
Note this: during my time on this app, I have seen thousands of videos of minors who HAVE violated guidelines, but I don‚Äôt see those videos getting removed. So is this a biased thing that‚Äôs happening? Because I follow people who try to educate others about certain niches, and their video gets taken down and they get shadow banned for no reason.
If this is an app that truly supports everyone, then you would be more on top of your algorithm, and remove the videos that are actually not okay. I really was starting to like TikTok, and I want to use it more often, but if this is going to keep happening, then why even keep the app.
Please fix this cause I did nothing wrong.

title: So many things are wrong
text:
First off, I‚Äôd like to begin with how the first paragraph was already written out for me which just goes to show how the messed up the algorithm really is.

to begin with, Videos are getting taken down even though they don‚Äôt violate the guidelines, videos with people telling others to end their lives, insulting them, or copywriting other people‚Äôs ideas will get reported over and over again but they NEVER get taken down. Not to mention toxic channels, I‚Äôm finding channels that only exist to make fun of other people and no matter how many times they get reported nothing happens. Meanwhile people will have their account suspended for saying a swear word or showing a fake weapon/gore.

Also, I‚Äôm constantly seeing popular creators complaining about how at least half of their followers aren‚Äôt seeing their videos. They‚Äôre constantly getting shadow banned for no reason and it really does take a toll on not only their love for this app, but mine too. These people have done nothing wrong and are very unproblematic, the only reason they‚Äôre losing traction is because they‚Äôre cosplayers/trans/add tags about BLM or LGBT. Please find a way to fix this so everyone can see their videos, we followed them for a reason and then never get to see their content.

title: Review of tiktok
text:
I have been on tiktok since 2016, and to this day I am a proud user. I love how far Tiktok has come from musically just a couple years ago! This shows determination in making a great experience for all users! I am not gonna lie, it‚Äôs also a very addicting app and I end up being on for 20 minutes to 2 hours. One of things I like is how after a certain amount of time scrolling through the for you page you put a video saying to either get sleep or something to eat and drink then come back. 
     Although this app is beyond amazing I have been questioning about safety. This may just be a rumor but people have been saying tiktok saves your drafts and can see them. There are many young users on tiktok that still need to get into a high school or college and if this is true please respect privacy. I might be wrong but for safety I need answers! 
     Otherwise, I have never seen better improvement in an app then Tiktok and I would not change a thing about the structure of this app. This app deserves a well deserved 5 star review! I hope you continue making people happy!

title: Glitches!!
text: I LOVE this app and I have been on it since musically but I have a few problems concerning the app and I would like to share them so that you can look into them. First, when I enter my following page I can see a few of my recents. (Keep in mind this is about three to five videos) But then I scroll down and I began to see videos from months ago. I tried to unfollow some people and I thought that might be the problem but I only follow about 80 people and it won‚Äôt let me see recent videos. I have asked a few people following me if this happens to them but they say it only happens sometimes to them, and others say all the time! Another problem that I have is that when I post videos sometimes it tells me there is a error and it puts it in my drafts. Right? It sounds normal. But no, when I go to my page the video has in fact posted but it is still in my drafts. I have perfectly fine WiFi and I have tried to see if that was the problem but it wasn‚Äôt so, like I said I love this app but it has a few glitches. This app is definitely worth 5 stars. ‚òÜ ‚òÜ ‚òÜ ‚òÜ ‚òÜ

title: Bullying is absolutely out of hand
text:
I definitely understand that this app does its best to stop bullying. I do not blame the app, I blame the people. There is so much and I feel like In order to stop it, you should suspend anyone who bullies. When I report things, I know when they get reported but I never get a follow up on what has happened and what has been done. I feel like when reporting stuff, you should allow the person reporting a video or someone to explain exactly what they are reporting and why, not just a selecting a choice on why they are reporting. There are many other reasons why one reports a video. I feel like you should create a feature on the app that allows one to explain why they report a video. In addition, there are some users on the app that make accounts solely for the purpose of bullying and they don‚Äôt even hide it. They make references to racism, suicide, and stuff like that while laughing and making jokes about them. I have tried reporting  multiple accounts like this, but they never get suspended or banned. I believe that in a case like this...you need to do more in banning these bullies. In my opinion, banning isn‚Äôt taking this far. 

You need to work on your bullying policy more

title: Great, but I‚Äôm not satisfied with some things.
text:
I am really not satisfied with the new update I was so used to doing things the other way. First, it won‚Äôt let me post pictures anymore. Second, you can ONLY go live if you have 1000 fans, which I don‚Äôt, and I really do like to go live. Third, why can‚Äôt there be a private box like there was before? Now there is only drafts, and it makes it harder to find probates because you have to scroll through your whole page, and what about those people that have like 1000 posts? Fourth, it limits you to like 20 letters/numbers, so I can barely write ANYTHING in my bio. I am NOT happy with that. Then the good things. First, when you tag ‚Äúforyou‚Äù, it usually gets you on the ‚ÄúFor you‚Äù page. Second, I like when you tap your finger and move it around, it makes a lot of cute little hearts. Third, I like how if you hold on a musically for a long time (like 5 seconds), it asks you if you‚Äôre not interested. Then you can press on that, and the musically goes away. 
    I do like the older version better, but this version is okay, I guess. Lots of new updates. :)) I can say though, that no matter how bad the update gets, I will still love musically. (Unless it gets like SUPER bad.)

title: I don‚Äôt really know how to rate this.

title: 5 stars!!‚≠êÔ∏è
text: Tiktok is an amazing app that allows you to make short videos of anything you want. There are dances you can learn, tutorials on things like led light colors, cleaning things out of carpetsüíÄüíÄ and many more! There are so many sides of tiktok too! For example, there is straight tiktok. This is where all of the dancing, slime, povs, and main stuff happens. Alt tiktok is where you get a mix of deep/creepy/funny videos and straight tiktok videos. Deep tiktok is the deepest side of tiktok that is very hard to get to. This is where all of the dark memes and vibes happen. I am on deep tiktok because there is absolutely no drama, no political comments, and all in all it‚Äôs a straight up vibe. There is theatre tiktok, Barbie tiktok, broccoli tiktok, and so many other sides. It‚Äôs actually insane how many sides of tiktok I have been on! You can add videos to favorites, hold down on the video and select not interested if you don‚Äôt like a video, and there are settings to manage your account. You can change videos to private or friends only so you can choose who sees the video or not. It‚Äôs a great way to pass the time and make new friends!
